item.title: os.path.join() or os.sep.join()?
item.description: There are two functions join a full path. E.g.: In drive: C: |- test | |- test.xt os.path.joinimport os fullpath = os.path.join('c:', 'test', 'test.txt') Output on windows: c:test\test.txt Output on Mac OS c:/test/test.txt os.sep.joinimport os fullpath = os.sep.join(['c:', 'test', 'test.txt']) Output on windows: c:\test\test.txt Output on Mac OS c:/test/test.txt From the outputs, you can see the difference: os.path.join()doesn't work as expect on windows.
